title: 3,4-Dimethoxy phenyl thiosemicarbazone as an effective corrosion inhibitor of copper under acidic solution: comprehensive experimental, characterization and theoretical investigations
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,12533-12555
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08629A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Naima Benachour, Amel Delimi, Hamza Allal, Abir Boublia, Amel Sedik, Hana Ferkous, Amel Djedouani, Smail Brioua, Chérifa Boulechfar, Hichem Benzouid, Abdelkrim Houssou, Ayhan Oral, Barbara Ernst, Manawwer Alam, Yacine Benguerba
This study investigates the corrosion inhibition potential of 3,4-dimethoxy phenyl thiosemicarbazone (DMPTS) for copper in 1 M hydrochloric acid (HCl) solutions, aiming to disclose the mechanism behind its protective action.
